Package org.cibseven.bpm.engine

Interface ProcessEngineServices

All Known Subinterfaces:
ProcessEngine
All Known Implementing Classes:
ProcessEngineExtension, ProcessEngineImpl, ProcessEngineRule, SpringProcessEngineServicesConfiguration
public interface ProcessEngineServices

Base interface providing access to the process engine's public API services.

Author:
Daniel Meyer
